com.lehman.ic9.io

Class file

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lehman.ic9.io.file

  • public class file
extends java.lang.Object
    File class implements various static methods for working with files.
    Author:
    Austin Lehman

      • read

        public static java.lang.String read(java.lang.String FileName)
                             throws ic9exception
        Reads a files contents into a string.
        Parameters:
        FileName - is a String with the file name to read.
        Returns:
        A String with the contents of the file.
        Throws:
        ic9exception - is an exception with the problem.

      • write

        public static void write(java.lang.String FileName,
                         java.lang.String Contents,
                         boolean Append)
                  throws ic9exception
        Writes a text file with the provided contents to the provided file name.
        Parameters:
        FileName - is a String with the file name to write.
        Contents - is a String with the contents of the file to write.
        Append - is a boolean with true to append and false to not.
        Throws:
        ic9exception - is an exception with the problem.

        Contents - is a byte array with the contents of the file to write.
        Append - is a boolean with true to append and false to not.
        Throws:
        ic9exception - is an exception with the problem.

      • unlink

        public static void unlink(java.lang.String FileName)
                   throws ic9exception
        Deletes the file or directory provided. Not if a directory is provided and has any contents this call will fail. To delete a directory with all of it's contents use rmdir instead.
        Parameters:
        FileName - is a String with the file or directory to delete.
        Throws:
        ic9exception - Exception

      • rmdir

        public static void rmdir(java.lang.String DirName)
                  throws ic9exception
        Deletes the provided directory and all contents and sub directories.
        Parameters:
        DirName - is a String with the directory to delete.
        Throws:
        ic9exception - Exception

      • deleteDir

        public static void deleteDir(java.io.File file)
        Helper that recursively deletes directories.
        Parameters:
        file - is a File object to delete.

      • listDir

        public static java.lang.Object listDir(ic9engine eng,
                                       java.lang.String FileName)
                                throws ic9exception,
                                       java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                       javax.script.ScriptException
        Lists the directory contents of the provided directory name and returns them as a JS list of strings.
        Parameters:
        eng - is the instance of the ic9engine.
        FileName - is a String with the directory.
        Returns:
        An Object which is a new JS list with the directory file names.
        Throws:
        ic9exception - Exception
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - Exception
        javax.script.ScriptException - Exception

      • mv

        public static void mv(java.lang.String Src,
                      java.lang.String Dest)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Moves a source file or directory to the destination file or directory. This method will replace existing files within the destination directory if present.
        Parameters:
        Src - is a String with the source path to move from.
        Dest - is a String with the destination path to move to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception
